## Path3D.update() method

Forces the Path3D tangent, normal, binormal and distance recomputation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(path: Vector3[], firstNormal?: Nullable<Vector3>): Path3D;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>Vector3[]</code> | path which all values are copied into the curves points |
|  firstNormal | <code>Nullable&lt;Vector3&gt;</code> | which should be projected onto the curve |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Path3D`

the same object updated.
